RGD Design Thinkers

This is my entry for the RGD Design Thinkers Scholarship. Contestants were required to give a brief introduction about themselves and state why they wanted to attend Design Thinkers 2016. If you weren’t aware, David Carson will be one of the keynote speakers. Enough said? I think so.
